name: SoluWorks
tag_list: domain-names, web-hosting, websites, e-commerce, ssl-certificates, software-development, customer-service, marketing
overview:
SoluWorks is an Internet domain registrar, Web host and Software Development company that also sells e-business related software and services.

As a creative multimedia production house, we are dedicated to building your brands, strengthening your customer relationships and growing your market share.

Formed in 2006 with a team of very successful and proven industry veterans, SoluWorks was built with intent to deliver the best value in Internet hosting, software and digital applications. Since inception, there has been one goal for SoluWorks to work creatively, effectively and above all, deliver stress-free solutions to our clients.

We help you save money so you can focus on your core business. SoluWorks boasts of a team of young, resourceful, consultants with a wide range of experience in ICT design, project management and implementation with an ultimate goal of giving all clients value for money. Relationships, Solutions, and Service are at the core of SoluWorks business strategies.

As a company, we want to move from ‘what can we offer?’ to ‘what do our customers really need?’

Our team responds to your needs with service, performance, innovation, and flexibility.

Our Approach:

Some of the reasons why more businesses choose SoluWorks.

  • Rigorous and qualitative approach
  • Effective teamwork
  • Market share and Competitor analysis
  • Cutting Edge Solutions Concept design and Implementation strategies web site

Investors and Ownership

Recognizing the importance of having employees that are vested in the success of the company, SoluWorks Ltd is partially owned by its employees and management team.

Hire Us to Do Your Work

Are you tired of looking at your buggy code and do not know how to fix it? Do you want your software or website but do not know how to start? The SoluWorks Team can help you on this.
